about_the_game:
Welcome to Dorpie, where the sky's the limit – literally! This casual city builder challenges you to construct a whimsical vertical town that defies gravity and ignites your imagination.

What is Dorpie?

Dorpie (pronounced "DOR-pee") is an Afrikaans word meaning "small town." But there's nothing small about the vertically sprawling villages you'll create!



Start with a limited plot of land and a handful of structures. As you build and complete objectives, you'll unlock new buildings, decorations, and platforms. With horizontal space at a premium, your only option is to build up, up, up! Rotate and stack structures to create a unique skyline that showcases your creativity and problem-solving skills.

Key Features

  • Vertical Stacking: Master the art of building upwards to create towering masterpieces.
  • Objective-Based Progression: Complete goals to unlock new content and expand your possibilities.
  • Relaxing Gameplay: Enjoy a stress-free building experience with no time pressure.
  • Vibrant Visuals: Immerse yourself in colorful, charming environments full of personality.
  • Endless Creativity: Discover new visual themes and structures with each play session.

What Sets Dorpie Apart

  • Unique Vertical Focus: Unlike traditional city builders, Dorpie challenges you to think vertically.
  • Perfect for Short Sessions: Ideal for players who want to create something amazing in bite-sized chunks.
  • No Complex Management: Focus on creativity without worrying about intricate resource systems.

What Dorpie Does Not Offer

  • Complex resource management
  • Combat or violence
  • Multiplayer

How to Play

Begin each run with an empty play area and a limited number of build tokens. As you construct your Dorpie, you'll uncover objectives. Complete them to earn more tokens and unlock new goals, gradually building your way to a legendary vertical village!

Developer

Dorpie is lovingly crafted by Jeremy, a solo game developer from South Africa passionate about creating relaxing and creative experiences. Your feedback and suggestions are always welcome!

short_description: Stack quirky buildings skyward in this charming city builder! With limited space, the only way is up. Place structures, complete objectives, and unlock new possibilities. Express your creativity, relax, and watch your absurdly wonderful town reach new heights!
